title: Reflective Practice-Based Project Course for Online Information Literacy Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental ability to search for and evaluate academic resources
context.additional_context: For pre-service/in-service teachers, emphasizing the cultivation of information literacy in social contexts, offering flexible learning environments using personal devices.

learning_goals: Learners can critically evaluate various online information sources and identify credible ones.
Learners can design and implement information literacy education projects applicable in educational settings.
Learners can systematically analyze their information acquisition process and derive improvement strategies through reflective journaling.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
